sentences.en: He had been stoical at their parting.
sentences.cn: 他们分手时他表现得很坦然。

sentences.en: He was stoical, serious, austere , a melancholy dreamer, humble and haughty, like fanatics.
sentences.cn: 他是坚决 、 严肃 、 铁面无私的, 他是沉郁的梦想者, 他能屈能伸, 有如盲从的信徒.

sentences.en: Her great-grandfather had clearly been a dedicated and stoical traveller.
sentences.cn: 她的曾祖父显然是一位非常投入而且坚忍不拔的旅行爱好者。

sentences.en: I have foun that you can be as stoical as any one, when you please.
sentences.cn: 我发现, 当你愿意的时候,你能够和任何人一样地冷静泰然.

sentences.en: She never ceased to admire the stoical courage of those in Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 她一直很敬佩爱尔兰北部人民的坚忍和勇敢。

sentences.en: She never ceased to admire the stoical courage of those soldiers.
sentences.cn: 她一直很敬佩那些士兵的坚忍的勇气。

words.tran_cn: 斯多葛哲学，斯多葛学派；恬淡寡欲
坚忍的；禁欲的；斯多葛学派的

trans.tran_en: not showing emotion or not complaining when bad things happen to you
